standard_abilities.Fey Ancestry: Advantage on saving throws against being charmed; immune to magical sleep
standard_abilities.Trance: Elves don't need to sleep. Instead, they meditate deeply for 4 hours (a long rest)

abilities.Cantrip: Gain 1 wizard cantrip (Intelligence as spellcasting ability)

abilities.Mask of the Wild: You can attempt to hide even when lightly obscured by foliage, heavy rain, falling snow, mist, and other natural phenomena

abilities.Sunlight Sensitivity: Disadvantage on attack rolls and Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight when in direct sunlight
abilities.Drow Magic: Dancing Lights cantrip. At 3rd level, cast Faerie Fire once per day. At 5th level, cast Darkness once per day (Charisma as spellcasting ability)
abilities.Drow Weapon Training: Proficiency with rapiers, shortswords, and hand crossbows
